title: Critical Thinking Simulation-Based Training for University English Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and academic background at an introductory college level
context.additional_context: Task-based problem-solving in interactive VR environments using job-linked English materials for office/administrative professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify logical fallacies in academic texts with 80% accuracy.
Learners can creatively propose at least three alternative solutions to complex problem scenarios presented in VR simulations.
Learners can revise their English thesis drafts three or more times based on peer feedback and document the critical thinking process.

resources: English Research Paper Samples Across Disciplines

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
